recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Cereal Bar #MixinVixens
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: This is a healthy cereal bar with cheerios, peanuts and dried cranberries with a bit of honey to sweeten. The liquid amber does a pretty good job of turning flv cranberry into dried cranberries and the cereal 27 backs up the breakfast cereal a bit while adding some honey sweetness.
